attributes.additional_details: evidence is overwhelming that the Faerie Folk were the indigenous people of The British Isles and that many people living here in the UK are indeed descendants of them, we call on the Government to give Faerie Folk equal rights, ban the racist "Faerie denial" (unacceptable hate speech such as "I do not believe in Faeries") and grant more Protection to our Ancient Tribal homelands the Woods and Forests

rejection.details: This you will need to be more specific about which laws are currently discriminatory that the Government will need to change.   This may of course cover several different departments so please resubmit concerning each topic of concern to the relevant Department.
